segments.text: It seems so strange to be here , burying you , but it's not you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ashes to ashes and dust to dust ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This has been the worst and best day of my life , Taylor . They kept you in the hospital , and ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll tell you all about it another day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you're OK ? It was nothing serious , was it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ladies look very elegant in black . But I don't want you to wear black in my honor for a long time yet to come ...
segments.speaker: S2
